Package model

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
model.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
Class representing the game board for Connect4.

    workingFile
    Represents the working file being used for game operations.

  • Field Details

    • BOARD_ROWS

      public static final int BOARD_ROWS
      Represents the number of rows on the game board.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BOARD_COLS

      public static final int BOARD_COLS
      Represents the number of columns on the game board.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • tileList

      public model.GameBoardTile[][] tileList
      Represents the 2D array of GameBoardTile objects representing the game board.

    • columnDepth

      private int[] columnDepth
      Represents the depth of each column in the game board. The index of this array corresponds to the column index on the game board.

    • path

      private final String path
      Represents the path where game save files are stored.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • workingFile

      private File workingFile
      Represents the working file being used for game operations.

    • winState

      public byte winState
      Represents the byte value indicating the win state of the game.

    • isNewGame

      public boolean isNewGame
      Represents a boolean flag indicating whether the game is a new one.

    • c4

      private CST8221.Connect4 c4
      Passed Connect4 instance

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(CST8221.Connect4 connect4, File gameFile)
      Constructs a new GameBoard instance.
      Parameters:
      connect4 - the main Connect4 game instance
      gameFile - the file representing the saved game state

  • Method Details

    • updateWorkingFile

      public boolean updateWorkingFile()
      Updates the working file with current game state.
      Returns:
      true if the file has been successfully updated, false otherwise

    • getWorkingFile

      public File getWorkingFile()
      Gets the working file.
      Returns:
      the working file

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin(byte targetTile)
      Checks if a player has won the game.
      Parameters:
      targetTile - the player's tile type (1 for RED, 2 for YELLOW)
      Returns:
      true if the player has won, false otherwise

    • updateWinLoss

      public void updateWinLoss(byte winTile)
      Updates the game state upon winning or losing.
      Parameters:
      winTile - the winning player's tile type (1 for RED, 2 for YELLOW, 3 for tie)

    • killBoard

      public void killBoard(boolean exitGame)
      Resets the board for a new game or clean shutdown.
      Parameters:
      exitGame - true if exiting the game, false otherwise

    • loadGame

      public boolean loadGame(File file)
      Loads a game state from a file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file containing the saved game state
      Returns:
      true if the game state was successfully loaded, false otherwise

    • colCheck

      public int[] colCheck()
      Checks the current column depths on the board.
      Returns:
      an array representing the current column depths

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Prints the current state of the game board.

    • refreshBoard

      public void refreshBoard(boolean closeWindow, boolean killBoard, boolean updateTurn)
      Refreshes the game board UI.
      Parameters:
      closeWindow - true if closing the window, false otherwise
      killBoard - true if killing the board, false otherwise
      updateTurn - true if updating the turn, false otherwise
